name: Celestial Scholar
text: The tradition of the celestial scholar is more academic than the paths of other cosmic sorcerers, and definitely more cerebral than the paths of other types of sorcerers. You plot the courses of the stars and other celestial bodies, and through this knowledge you gain access to a well of power as vast as the night sky.

features.celestialAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls with cold, psychic, and radiant powers until the end of your next turn
features.cosmicConcordance(11thLevel): When you use a daily arcane attack power and choose to change your Soul of the Cosmic Cycle phase, you can change to either of the two other phases
features.phaseFocus(11thLevel): One of your Soul of the Cosmic Cycle phases becomes more powerful
features.celestialDefense(16thLevel): When you are in the phase corresponding to your Phase Focus, you gain a +2 bonus to all defenses

flavorText: In the sun’s golden hall, I blaze with light. In the moon’s shadowed chambers, I beguile the mind. In the firmament, I am the brightest star.
